definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]

sentences.english: The bells of the old temple resounded throughout the valley.
sentences.chinese: 古刹钟声在山谷中回荡。

sentences.english: Sporadic gunfire from insurgents down the main road flies harmlessly overhead.
sentences.chinese: 暴乱分子零星的炮火声在主街道上空回荡。

sentences.english: Joyful songs are still around our ears, cheerful drums are still in our hearts.
sentences.chinese: 愉悦的歌声还回荡在耳畔，快乐的鼓点还奏响在心中。

sentences.english: Malone could hear footfalls echoing from the flooring above.
sentences.chinese: 马龙可以听到上面的脚步声回荡下来。

sentences.english: Electronic music and raw sound effects fill the air.
sentences.chinese: 电子音乐和原始的音效在空气中回荡。

sentences.english: Means forceful voice echoed through the air.
sentences.chinese: 刚劲有力的声音在空气中回荡。

sentences.english: Laughter also reverberating in the ear, sigher engraved in the hearts.
sentences.chinese: 笑声还回荡在耳旁，情分依然刻在心上。

sentences.english: Other-worldly chanting, to the rhythm of the rising and falling picks resonated through the hot, still air.
sentences.chinese: 闷热的空气里回荡着圣歌的旋律和镐斧起落的声音。

sentences.english: The power of your ear-splitting war cry echoes across the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 你震耳欲聋的战争呐喊在战场上回荡。

sentences.english: A soft strain of music wound into the air.
sentences.chinese: 柔和的乐曲在空中回荡。

sentences.english: The first king of the town that "we are the same" was the song echoed.
sentences.chinese: 王镇的那首《我们都一样》的歌声在回荡。

sentences.english: Their shouts re-echoed through the valley.
sentences.chinese: 他们的喊声在山谷中回荡。

sentences.english: The voice of the chapter leader goes slowly around the room.
sentences.chinese: 分部话事人的声音缓缓的回荡在房间中。

sentences.english: Long be heard this roar over endless realms, in the echoing of a thousand heartstrings .
sentences.chinese: 愿这长啸之声响彻天地，在千亿心弦间久久地回荡。

sentences.english: Our voice reverberates across the mountains, while beauty reverberates in our heart!
sentences.chinese: 我们的呼唤在山峦回荡，美在我们心间回响。

sentences.english: The cool voice resounds in the auditorium, Zhang Kai's eye pupil is a burst of to enlarge later on.
sentences.chinese: 冷冷的声音在大厅回荡，随后张凯的瞳孔一阵放大。

definition: variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
high-pitched and penetrating (musical instrument, voice etc)/high-spirited/fever-pitched (atmosphere)
loud sound, such as that of thunder or a bomb/to rumble/to roar
